title: Star topped mince pies
description: I used to think that making your own mince pies was a ridiculous notion. Believe me, it isn't.
ingredients: 60g/2oz cold butter, cut into small cubes
You will need a miniature tart tray, each indent 4.5cm/1¾in diameter, a 5.5cm/2¼in round fluted biscuit cutter and a 4cm/1½in star-shaped pastry cutter.
